title: Ukrainians Celebrate Christmas on Dec. 25 For the First Time
description: In the past, Ukrainians observed Christmas on Jan. 7, in accordance with the Russian Orthodox Church. This year, in a first, Christmas came on Dec. 25.

title: Alexei Navalny, Russian Opposition Activist, Found in an Arctic Penal Colony
description: Associates of Russian politician and opposition activist Alexei Navalny say he has been located at a prison colony about the Arctic Circle.

title: Check Out the Galaxy’s Very Own Christmas Tree
description: A new composite image from NASA highlights an arborescent cluster of stars.

title: King Charles III’s Christmas Message Is a Call to Protect the Planet
description: In a pre-recorded Christmas address, King Charles III discussed the need for public service to care for the earth for future generations.

title: Egypt Proposes Ceasefire Amid One of the Deadliest Israeli Airstrikes Yet to Hit Gaza Strip
description: The Egyptian proposal comes amid one of the deadliest Israeli airstrikes to hit the Gaza Strip, with a death toll of 106 as of writing.

title: Ukraine Says It Shot Down Russian Fighter Jets and Drones on Christmas Eve
description: Ukraine's air force said it shot down two Russian fighter jets and 28 drones on the night before Christmas.

title: In Christmas Day Blessing, Pope Francis Denounces the Weapons Industry and Appeals For World Peace
description: In a Christmas Day speech, Pope Francis called for world peace—in particular between Israel and the Palestinians—and denounced weaponmakers.

title: The Story Behind The Boys in the Boat
description: Daniel James Brown, whose book inspired 'The Boys in the Boat' on the University of Washington rowing team and the 1936 Berlin Olympics

title: How The Color Purple Has Evolved Throughout Its Many Adaptations
description: From the book to the musical to the movie, here's what to know about the many adaptations of 'The Color Purple.'

title: The True Story Behind Michael Mann’s Ferrari
description: Michael Mann’s Ferrari, out Dec. 25, is an unsparing portrayal of the famed race car driver and automotive entrepreneur

title: How The Color Purple‘s Climactic “I’m Here” Came to Life on Stage and Screen
description: Fantasia Barrino, LaChanze, and Cynthia Erivo talk with TIME about "I'm Here" and what 'The Color Purple' song means to them

title: In the Musical Version of The Color Purple, Joy Rules the Day
description: 'The Color Purple' is lively and fun, without betraying the heavy undertones of some of its subject matter.
